name: JumpCity
description:
JumpCity -  a City Builder Platformer

Young mayor, it is up to you to build this new town. Plan your buildings smartly so that they all meet their requirements.

But to build, you need construction materials. The delivery crates are scattered all around the land, you wil have to find them and gather them. unluckily, you lost a bet to your brother and now the floor is lava.

Game Jam information

This game is a submission for the MixAndGameJam 2020. I worked on it alone, except for the music that was made by a friend.

Almost all assets were in the 48 hours of the jam:

  • the 3D models and graphics
  • the music (thanks Malkins0n <3)
  • the code

The only elements that were reused are:

  • the few SFX, retrieve on freesound.org (CC0 license)
  • the mayor's animations are from Mixamo
  • a personal finite state machine system for the character controller (https://github.com/Helluys/FsmCore - i suggest you do not use it, it is crap)
Limitations

Due to the short time allowed, I could not go as far is I wished. Here are some things I know should be improved:

  • Add a menu allowing to restart/quit/configure the game
  • Provide a true tutorial or way to understand the game (instead of this hastily added and ugly text panel)
  • Display current status of buildings, and give the player a way to know why a building is depraved
  • Allow to remap the controls (damn it InputSystem, Y U no work)

There are probably plenty other things that need improvement. But hey, that was 48 hours.
